data.comment: The match is underway in Sangju.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Sangju.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Incheon Utd, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Can Incheon Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 9, Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Kim Jun-beom (Incheon Utd) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Oh Hyeon-gyu gives Sangju Sangmu a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 13, That's a fine assist from Seon-min Moon.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Incheon Utd needs to be cautious. Sangju Sangmu have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, In Sangju Sangju Sangmu attack through Kim Min-hyeok. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 18, Free kick Incheon Utd.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Jong Hyeok Kim.
Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Lee Dong-su gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 23, Incheon Utd drive upfield and Ji Eon-hak gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sangju Sangmu defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 25, Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Sangju Sangmu's Oh Hyeon-gyu gets in a shot on goal at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Great finish from Kim Min-hyeok to give Sangju Sangmu a 2-0 lead.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 31, Ban-Suk Oh (Incheon Utd) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Incheon Utd.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a throw-in for Incheon Utd, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 38, In Sangju, Stefan Mugosa (Incheon Utd) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Stefan Mugosa. .
In the minute 39, Great play from Kim Jun-yeob to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa breaks free at Sangju Civic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 44, Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jong Hyeok Kim will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 48, It's now 3-1 in Sangju as Jeong Jae-Hee scores for Sangju Sangmu.
Seon-min Moon instrumental with a fine assist.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
Stefan Mugosa for Incheon Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 57, Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Sung-Hwan Cho (Incheon Utd) is making a first substitution, with Lee Ho-Seok replacing Ji Eon-hak.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 58, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 60, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Incheon Utd have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu attack but Park Byeong-hyeon's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sangju.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 65, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 67, Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
Sangju Sangmu's Jeong Jae-Hee gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Sangju Civic Stadium.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Elias Aguilar is replacing Kim Jun-beom for Incheon Utd at Sangju Civic Stadium.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
Sung-Hwan Cho is making the team's third substitution at Sangju Civic Stadium with Lee Uh-hyeok replacing Song Shi-uh.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sangju.
In the minute 78, Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Oh Hyeon-gyu with Song Seung-min. This is the first substitution made today by Kim Tae-wan.
Lee Dong-su gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Incheon Utd.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
Jong Hyeok Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Incheon Utd push forward at Sangju Civic Stadium and Elias Aguilar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sangju Sangmu defence.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Incheon Utd.
Lee Uh-hyeok of Incheon Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Jong Hyeok Kim awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Jung Won-jin is replacing Kim Min-hyeok for the home team.
In the minute 89, Can Incheon Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
Throw-in Incheon Utd.
Jong Hyeok Kim signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Free kick Incheon Utd.
Elias Aguilar (Incheon Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Sangju a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 3-1.
